snippet: Leroy Sane has travelled to England ahead of a proposed move to Premier League club Manchester City, the German winger's side Schalke 04 have confirmed....

headline.main: Schalke Confirm Sane in Manchester for City Move Talks
headline.print_headline: Schalke Confirm Sane in Manchester for City Move Talks

lead_paragraph: Leroy Sane has travelled to England ahead of a proposed move to Premier League club Manchester City, the German winger's side Schalke 04 have confirmed.

snippet: Watford have signed Colombia defender Juan Camilo Zuniga from Napoli on a season-long loan with an option to make the deal permanent, the Premier League club said on their website on (www.watfordfc.com) on Saturday....

headline.main: Watford Sign Colombia Defender Zuniga on Season-Long Loan
headline.print_headline: Watford Sign Colombia Defender Zuniga on Season-Long Loan

lead_paragraph: Watford have signed Colombia defender Juan Camilo Zuniga from Napoli on a season-long loan with an option to make the deal permanent, the Premier League club said on their website on (www.watfordfc.com) on Saturday.

snippet: English Premier League champions Leicester City are set to make Hanover 96 goalkeeper Ron-Robert Zieler their first signing of this transfer window....

headline.main: Champions Leicester Set to Sign Hanover Keeper Zieler
headline.print_headline: Champions Leicester Set to Sign Hanover Keeper Zieler

lead_paragraph: English Premier League champions Leicester City are set to make Hanover 96 goalkeeper Ron-Robert Zieler their first signing of this transfer window.

snippet: Accountancy firm KPMG says Manchester United and Real Madrid are soccer's most valuable clubs, worth an estimated 2.9 billion euros ($3.2 billion) each....

headline.main: Study: Man United, Real Madrid Soccer's Most Valuable Clubs
headline.print_headline: Study: Man United, Real Madrid Soccer's Most Valuable Clubs

lead_paragraph: Accountancy firm KPMG says Manchester United and Real Madrid are soccer's most valuable clubs, worth an estimated 2.9 billion euros ($3.2 billion) each.

snippet: Frank de Boer would find it difficult to turn down an opportunity to manage Everton and is looking forward to the challenges of the Premier League, his brother Ronald has said....

headline.main: Frank De Boer Keen on Everton Job, Says Brother Ronald
headline.print_headline: Frank De Boer Keen on Everton Job, Says Brother Ronald

lead_paragraph: Frank de Boer would find it difficult to turn down an opportunity to manage Everton and is looking forward to the challenges of the Premier League, his brother Ronald has said.

snippet: Former Arsenal and France midfielder Robert Pires, a member of  France's 1998 World Cup-winning squad, has announced his retirement from football at the age of 42....

headline.main: Robert Pires Retires From Football at Age 42
headline.print_headline: Robert Pires Retires From Football at Age 42

lead_paragraph: Former Arsenal and France midfielder Robert Pires, a member of  France's 1998 World Cup-winning squad, has announced his retirement from football at the age of 42.

snippet: Slovakia defender Martin Skrtel is on the verge of completing his move to Fenerbahce from Liverpool with the Turkish side saying he completed his medical on Wednesday....

headline.main: Skrtel Set to Join Fenerbahce After Completing Medical
headline.print_headline: Skrtel Set to Join Fenerbahce After Completing Medical

lead_paragraph: Slovakia defender Martin Skrtel is on the verge of completing his move to Fenerbahce from Liverpool with the Turkish side saying he completed his medical on Wednesday.

snippet: Barcelona did just enough to defeat last-place Levante, 2-0, in Madrid on Sunday and tie its club record of 28 consecutive games without a loss....
abstract: Barcelona defeats Levante, 2-0; other soccer matches noted.
lead_paragraph: Barcelona did just enough to defeat last-place Levante, 2-0, in Madrid on Sunday and tie its club record of 28 consecutive games without a loss.

snippet: Uruguay striker Cristhian Stuani marked his first appearance in the Premier League with two goals to guide Middlesbrough to a 2-1 win at northeast rival Sunderland on Sunday....

headline.main: Stuani Double Earns Middlesbrough 2-1 Win at Sunderland
headline.print_headline: Stuani Double Earns Middlesbrough 2-1 Win at Sunderland

lead_paragraph: Uruguay striker Cristhian Stuani marked his first appearance in the Premier League with two goals to guide Middlesbrough to a 2-1 win at northeast rival Sunderland on Sunday.

snippet: The "big" teams in the Premier League have not turned on the turbochargers yet, Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri said, as his side sit level on points with leaders Arsenal after a surprise transformation from regulation strugglers....

headline.main: Big Teams Have Not Switched on Yet, Says Leicester's Ranieri
headline.print_headline: Big Teams Have Not Switched on Yet, Says Leicester's Ranieri

lead_paragraph: The "big" teams in the Premier League have not turned on the turbochargers yet, Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri said, as his side sit level on points with leaders Arsenal after a surprise transformation from regulation strugglers.
